title: Report Water Main Break
description: A driver calls to report a large amount of water bubbling up from a street, suspecting a water main break.

tasks.description: Get the exact location of the suspected break.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the address and cross-streets.

tasks.description: Check the network management system for any pressure alarms in that area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms low-pressure alarms on the corresponding water main.

tasks.description: Dispatch an emergency water crew to the location to assess the situation and begin repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority work order for the water department.
